originalText.text: Single greatest doctors appointment of my life, I wish he was my doctor not just my sons. He was focused, straight forward and actually talked to us. I didn't even care it was a virtual visit. It was clear he knew his stuff, cared and answered all our questions. It didn't feel rushed and I would recommend him to anyone.

text.text: Single greatest doctors appointment of my life, I wish he was my doctor not just my sons. He was focused, straight forward and actually talked to us. I didn't even care it was a virtual visit. It was clear he knew his stuff, cared and answered all our questions. It didn't feel rushed and I would recommend him to anyone.

originalText.text: Dr. Miodovnic saw my son many years ago in Japan when my son experienced an anaphylactic shock.  He came to the hospital off duty to assess my son and make sure he was ok.  Will never forget that gesture,  or the amazing insight he provided w/ my other children when they were sick.  One of my favorite pediatricians by far!!

originalText.text: I need so badly to locate this doctor.  Dr Miodovnik treated my daughter Toni-Ann since 2016 and I'm so grateful for the care that he gave.  One of the best pediatricians I have come to know and trust.    He is simply the best!!!
